definition: abbr. for 揚州|扬州[Yang2 zhou1]/surname Yang
to raise/to hoist/the action of tossing or winnowing/scattering (in the wind)/to flutter/to propagate

sentences.english: A proper interpretation of them is of practical significance to the widespread of Wudang Taoism Culture.
sentences.chinese: 解读该联语，对于阐扬武当文化具有现实的意义。

sentences.english: Take your passion as well as make it come true.
sentences.chinese: 阐扬你的热情，让好梦成真。

definition: to elucidate/to expound/to study and explain
doctrine (esp. religious)/argumentation (in a speech or essay)
variant of 弘揚|弘扬[hong2 yang2]
work or plans left as a legacy/the views of the departed/posthumous orders or teachings
to compose (a piece of writing)/to write/(written) work/writer
to enlighten/to civilize/to indoctrinate/to train (an animal)
Dharma (the teachings of the Buddha)/Buddhist doctrine
to make the world a better place
